choose.when: WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' OR caption LIKE '%'||#{caption}||'%'

mapper.select:
SELECT num, name, caption, img_path, regdate, ended_dt, deadline_dt, start_dt, manager_id, max_people, now_people, avrg_rate, meeting_loc, meeting_time, genre, on_off, manager_comment, viewcount FROM group_tb
ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT result.*, r.rate FROM ( SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT num, writer, title, caption, imagePath, regdate FROM group_tb ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 ) result INNER JOIN ( SELECT title, ROUND(AVG(rate), 2) AS rate FROM board_review GROUP BY title ) r ON result.title = r.title ORDER BY r.rate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_tb (num, name, caption, img_path, regdate, ended_dt, deadline_dt, start_dt, manager_id, max_people, meeting_loc, meeting_time, genre, on_off, manager_comment) VALUES(group_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{caption}, #{img_path}, SYSDATE, #{ended_dt}, #{deadline_dt}, #{start_dt}, #{manager_id}, #{max_people}, #{meeting_loc}, #{meeting_time}, #{genre}, #{on_off}, #{manager_comment})
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, caption, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM group_tb) result1 WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, caption, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM group_tb
ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE title = #{title}
